channel.description: Recent content in Projects on mikeder.net

item.title: Rust Server
item.description: Self hosting a Rust dedicated server to learn and screw around on. Map wipe schedule may change depending on server performance and force wipe schedule, blueprints will not wipe unless forced by Facepunch. Name: [tS] Iron Oxide - US | Low Upkeep Wipe Schedule: Monthly, every 3rd Thursday Wipe Stats # Start End Unique Players Map Info 1 9/21/23 10/19/23 49 https://rustmaps.com/map/4250_66972398 2 10/19/23 11/02/23 50 https://rustmaps.com/map/3500_1393213226 3 11/02/23 11/30/23 132 https://rustmaps.

item.title: Turtle Time
item.description: Turtle Time is a multiplayer battle game written in Rust, using the Bevy Game Engine. It features peer-to-peer networking using the bevy_ggrs crate and matchbox crate and server for matchmaking with peers. Play it online @ https://mikeder.net/turtletime Source code Download Releases

item.title: TimelineRS
item.description: TimelineRS is a simple timeline creation app written in Rust. It uses egui and eframe for native and web builds with web assembly. Check it out here: TimelineRS Source Code

item.title: Music
item.description: Sometimes I record synthesizer jams and upload them to SoundCloud, YouTube, Bandcamp, or my personal music server Navidrome Jamuary 2023 Playlist Bandcamp Albums Juxtaposition by Mike Eder Bandcamp Tracks Twosyn by Mike Eder Gerp9 by Mike Eder
